```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
files <- list.files("./data")
data_frame(files) %>%
  rowwise() %>% 
  mutate(informant = unlist(str_split(files, "_\\d{4}_"))[1],
         year = str_extract(files, "\\d{4}"),
         informant = str_extract(informant, "\\D*"),
         word = unlist(str_split(files, "_\\d{4}_"))[2],
         utterance = unlist(str_split(word, "_"))[2],
         word = unlist(str_split(word, "_"))[1],
         type = unlist(str_split(files, ":"))[2],
         type = str_replace(type, ".png", ""),
         files = paste0('<div class="inner"> посмотреть <img src="./data/', files, '" alt=""> </div>')) %>% 
  select(informant, year, word, utterance, type, files) %>% 
  DT::datatable(filter = 'top', rownames = FALSE, options = list(pageLength = 50, dom = 'tip'), escape = FALSE)
```
